Description_lang: Transforms the enemy into a harmless Turkey, forcing it to waddle around for up to $d.  While waddling, the turkey cannot attack or cast spells but will regenerate very quickly.  Any damage will transform the target back into its normal form.  Only one target can be polymorphed at a time.  Only works on Beasts, Humanoids and Critters.
AuraDescription_lang: Cannot attack or cast spells.  Increased regeneration.
